abstract: Highbridge Capital Management, the hedge fund company owned by JPMorgan Chase, is limiting client withdrawal requests to avoid selling assets at distressed prices, Bloomberg News reported, citing a person familiar with the matter.
lead_paragraph: Highbridge Capital Management, the hedge fund company owned by JPMorgan Chase, is limiting client withdrawal requests to avoid selling assets at distressed prices, Bloomberg News reported, citing a person familiar with the matter.

headline.main: Highbridge Said to to Limit Redemptions
